name: Viewports Pirates
description:
My attempt to create a multi-viewport local multiplayer game in Gdevelop5, since that's not yet supported at this time (Oct 2021)

Controls: 

Yellow: Arrowkeys, right control to fire

Blue: WASD, left control to fire

Red: ijkl, space to fire

Green: Numpad 8456, numpad + to fire. (numlock on) Or, use gamepad.
